actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include security guards at installations of the Federal Government within the provisions of such title relating to civil service retirement of Government employees engaged in certain hazardous occupations.

summary.text: Includes security guards at installations of the Federal Government within the definition of employees engaged in hazardous occupations for civil service retirement purposes. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336c)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include security guards at installations of the Federal Government within the provisions of such title relating to civil service retirement of Government employees engaged in certain hazardous occupations.
